# appleArchive

**Type Property**

A type that represents an Apple archive of files and directories.

## Declaration

```swift
static var appleArchive: UTType { get }
```

## Discussion

The identifier for this type is `com.apple.archive`.

This type conforms to [doc://com.apple.uniformtypeidentifiers/documentation/UniformTypeIdentifiers/UTType-swift.struct/data] and [doc://com.apple.uniformtypeidentifiers/documentation/UniformTypeIdentifiers/UTType-swift.struct/archive].

## Compressed archives

- **archive**: A base type that represents an archive of files and directories.
- **zip**: A type that represents a zip archive.
- **gzip**: A type that represents a GNU zip archive.
- **bz2**: A type that represents a bzip2 archive.
